Nightlight/Quetzalcoatl::

"But..."replied Quetzalcoatl"if some one will leave this place and 
others wait to delay our enemies, who leave the base will need a 
defence if the tunnel is discovered... and the most important where 
will we join??? " Quetzalcoatl added "we could use the remains of my 
ship while we build a new base... but I guess that won't be good 
defence... my ship is in ruins..."


Nightlight looked to Terrataur and asked her "What happened with your 
ship??? Can we use it as new base?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Starstomp: Just as long as autodefenses keep them busy, I don't 
think 
> they'd be even smart enough to notice it... Except the Bitch... 
> 
> She thought for a few moments.
> 
> Starstomp: Or, we could leave some warriors here while the others 
> tunnel their way away. Warriors would join later. This would still 
> leave them alive, though... If we want this threat to be cleared, 
we 
> have to teach them one hell of a lesson!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >        He nods.  They're after Nightlight and little Trinity.  I 
> can't 
> > remember what we did to them but they've bound themselves 
together 
> out of a 
> > hatred of us."  He sighs.  "Do you think they'd notice if we 
> tunneled through 
> > the mountain to the other side?"
